items.content_html: 📈Lightweight k-line chart that can be highly customized. Zero dependencies. Support mobile.（可高度自定义的轻量级k线图，无第三方依赖，支持移动端）

items.content_html: ✨ Viselect - A high performance and lightweight library to add a visual way of selecting elements, just like on your Desktop. Zero dependencies, super small. Support for major frameworks!
items.title: simonwep/viselect: ✨ Viselect - A high performance and lightweight library to add a visual way of selecting elements, just like on your Desktop. Zero dependencies, super small. Support for major frameworks!

items.content_html: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. The app integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch accurate weather details, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, cloud coverage, and sunrise/sunset times
items.title: giovannifdipasquale/weather_fetch: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. The app integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch accurate weather details, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, cloud coverage, and sunrise/sunset times

items.content_html: sqlparser-devexpress is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL 'WHERE' clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.
items.title: RohitM-IN/SQLParser:  sqlparser-devexpress is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL 'WHERE' clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.

items.content_html: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
items.title: mankarshubham81/super-chat: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
